verse.name: v1
verse.lines: R. (6b) The Lord upholds my life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O God, by your name save me,
and by your might defend my cause.
O God, hear my prayer;
hearken to the words of my mouth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: R. The Lord upholds my life.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: R. The Lord upholds my life.

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: R. The Lord upholds my life.
